vote.title: Appointment of Kristin Lowery, Vice President and Chief Security Officer, American Electric Power, 1 Riverside Plaza, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Franklin Park Conservatory Joint Recreational District Board of Trustees, with a term expiration date of January 31, 2029 (resume attached).

Appointment of Kristin Lowery, Vice President and Chief Security Officer, American Electric Power, 1 Riverside Plaza, Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Franklin Park Conservatory Joint Recreational District Board of Trustees, with a term expiration date of January 31, 2029 (resume attached).
